main.name: Antonios Lampros
main.description: Experienced engineer with a focus on cloud Development
main.bio: Holder of Bsc degree in accounting & finance from the University of Patras, looking for a change in career towards web development. I am interested in front end desing using the React framework and also i plan to deploy my own applications with Node to update my skills with Javascript. Lastly i am interest in cloud technology and how it can relate to efficiency to deploy my own apps.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bsc of Science, Msc Information and Communication Systems.
education.description: Since the beginning of my academic career, I have been interested in business intelligence and E-Governance as well as open-source applications. I am a member of the WWTP/LAC branch of the U.S.A. and in the 3rd year I was a member of a team for the development of a mobile application on behalf of EOSS. The biggest achievement, however, is in E-Governance, where I have participated as a speaker at OpenGov in June 2015.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
